Posts.Content: Hi Carolyn I'm sympathetic! I've only had one treatment of FEC and I've found the same - sore, itchy, broken skin :( I think it is because our urine is so acidic now as a result of the chemo. I'm still trying to drink 3 ltrs per day plus I'm testing my urine daily (you can buy strips online) and trying to keep my diet more alkaline to compensate. (more veggie diet) It is helping... Good luck Px
Posts.Title: labia / lady parts / why does it sting when I pee ? undocumented chemo...
